short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Synchronously manage your extensions for Chrome and Fireforx through the Github.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Sync is a tool to synchronously manage Chrome and Firefox browser extensions through the Github's gist.

When you use a new computer and install the Chrome/Firefox browser, you want to migrate the extensions from the old PC's browser. You can use the Extension Sync to do it easily.

First you will login with your Github account by authorizing Extension Sync. When you click the button - 'Sync to Github', Extension Sync will send the data of your locally installed extensions to your private gists. Finally you can login to Extension Sync with the same Github account on your new PC and synchronize the data to the new browser.
